subject: Basketball
Acrobats and Acrobatics
Chairs
NBA Championship
lead_paragraph: The Cavaliers are 3-0 when the 56-year-old acrobat known as the Amazing Sladek, who will be in Cleveland for Game 6 on Tuesday, performs the death-defying tower of chairs at halftime.
snippet: The Cavaliers are 3-0 when the 56-year-old acrobat known as the Amazing Sladek, who will be in Cleveland for Game 6 on Tuesday, performs the death-defying tower of chairs at halftime.
